emailTemplates.name: Instance About to Expire Template
emailTemplates.template:
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.email.instanceExpiring" user.displayName instance.displayName instance.expireDate}}}

{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.info"}}}

{{#if instance.description}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.description"}}}:
{{instance.description}}
{{/if}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.createdBy"}}}:
{{user.userName}} ({{{user.displayName}}})
{{#if instance.instanceContext}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.environment"}}}:
{{instance.instanceContext}}
{{/if}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.group"}}}:
{{instance.site.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.layout"}}}:
{{instance.layout.name}}
{{#each instance.metadata}} {{#if name}}
{{name}}:
{{value}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}

{{#each instance.containers}} {{#if isDocker}}

{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.detailsFor" name}}}

{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.plan"}}}:
{{plan.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.memory"}}}:
{{maxMemory}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.totalStorage"}}}:
{{maxStorage}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.status"}}}:
{{status}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.cloud"}}}:
{{server.zone.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.type"}}}:
{{containerType.name}}

{{else}}

{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.detailsFor" server.displayName}}}

{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.plan"}}}:
{{plan.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.cpuCores"}}}
{{maxCores}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.memory"}}}:
{{maxMemory}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.totalStorage"}}}:
{{maxStorage}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.status"}}}:
{{status}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.cloud"}}}:
{{server.zone.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.platform"}}}:
{{server.serverOs.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.sourceImage"}}}:
{{server.sourceImage.name}}
{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.hostname"}}}:
{{server.externalFqdn}}



{{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.networks"}}}
    {{#each server.interfaces}}
  • {{network.name}}
    {{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.ipAddress"}}}:
    {{ipAddress}}
    {{#if macAddresss}}
    {{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.macAddress"}}}:
    {{macAddress}} {{/if}} {{#if type}}
    {{{i18n "gomorpheus.label.interfaceType"}}}:
    {{type.name}}
    {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}

{{{extendLink}}}
